short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust news.ycombinator.com font size, and save your local setting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small tool to enhance readability on http://news.ycombinator.com/. This extension allows you to resize the content fonts for hacker news, proportionally to their original size.
